channel.title: Element Sword - Fire
channel.description:
ok.. so it was requested by a bloke that i make a rune sword so i went a head and made something like that and it took acouple hours but i guess it was worth it just for kicks so here you go.. enjoy :)
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/eleswordfire.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/eleswordfire-wire.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/eleswordfire-wire2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/eleswordfire-wire3.jpg[/img]
New version? anyone like it?... just a quick edit nothing major
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/elesword-fireupdate.jpg[/img]

item.title: Element Sword - Fire
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:58, topic:379967”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=475810.msg3481122#msg3481122 date=1296141408]
He turned into a douche.
[/quote]
No, he turned into Assassin Creed Fan.[/quote]I fucking love you for saying that.

And listen to Dylan Amy, he’s one of the top modelers here and his advice is always good

Read full topic

item.title: Element Sword - Fire
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

rip4d:

He turned into a douche.

No, he turned into Assassin Creed Fan.

Ontopic: Design is unique. I personally am not a fan of it, but its better than your previous models, so you are improving. The sooner you make the complete transition to primitive modeling, the sooner you will truly increase your skill level.

Read full topic

item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:52, topic:379967”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=475810.msg3480962#msg3480962 date=1296112765]

Trolling = spam = reportable = removal of post

= win?
[/quote]
Oh do be quiet, you have no idea and never will have any idea what you are talking about.[/quote]Get the fuck over yourself already. Nobody here likes you as it is, so why make it worse? Yeah, you were trolling, obvious fact is obvious, which is why I had reported you for it, so why make a huge deal of it? If all you’re going to be is a nonsensical prick, than leave Moparscape and never come back. Mental/social disorder my ass, you’re not wanted here.

item.title: Element Sword - Fire
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:40, topic:379967”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=475810.msg3480468#msg3480468 date=1296076645]

I like how people think it would break even though it is a 3D model, thats like saying…umm… if you used that 3D sword in combat it would break…yah stupid.

I like it. i dont like the red blade. maybe you should put like a red line down the middle? or something?

yer, your first point exactly what im thinking… anywho what about the one with fire any comments toward that? i wants to know if thats what i should go on the elements or something else

[/quote]
The design should look like flames. Not be flames. That is just my personal opinion. I’m not saying make the blade a flame. I’m saying the hilt should have a fiery look to it. Really dislike those stars too…[/quote]

the reason i did hte hilt like that was so it could relate to another element sword if i were to make one and the blade isnt a flame it just has a flame thing on it… wouldnt burn you if you touched it

Read full topic

item.title: Element Sword - Fire
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:36, topic:379967”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=475810.msg3479826#msg3479826 date=1296010954]
People care about realism for some reason when we should be really inspiring creativity.
[/quote]
This is because Moparscape members do not seem to understand that not everything has to be realistic. Being realistic is great, but being creative without removing the aspect of reality is better.[/quote]Yeah, but for a beginner modeler, being creative is a great thing. I might make a model today since all I had to do was a midterm exam, maybe show realism and creativity.

Read full topic

item.title: Element Sword - Fire
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

rip4d:

People care about realism for some reason when we should be really inspiring creativity.

This is because Moparscape members do not seem to understand that not everything has to be realistic. Being realistic is great, but being creative without removing the aspect of reality is better.

Read full topic

item.description:

thats why i made the coffee cup… its real isnt it?

Is that liquid inside of it?

Okay now you guys are just being dicks. You can’t make a realistic liquid in meta. No particles in meta silly. Not really a good way to try and encourage new modelers.
Edit: not entirely directed at you reyx.[/quote]

TabbyKiller:

Your name should be Miss SuperiorSoft

whos that directed at?
